summary: this is simply a Linkle preset for Racemenu
descriptionHtml:
while doing a LOZ play through I wanted to have Linkle as a follower for my Link character. After hours of searching for one on every mod website I finally gave up and downloaded familiar faces to make my own. this is the outcome of what I feel is a masterpiece. this is my first upload so I would appreciate some feedback and for Hylia's sake be nice when you do!

I do not take credit for the hair, eyes and eyebrows. those were all from some extremity talented modders and i would have no clue how to do anything like that. i do however take credit for the face because it took hours on end to create and many crashes.if you wish to make a follower out of this as a mod and post it then be my guest Just please for the love of Nayru give me credit for my time. if for some reason you would like to incorporate this into a much more complex mod as an npc again please credit me. now lets move onto the requirements She is an [b][i][u]imperial[/u][/i][/b]

[u][b]Requirements[/b][/u]
Brows - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?
ApaciiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
Eyes of Aber - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?

[u][b]Recomended[/b][/u]
DIMONIZED UNP female body - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?
AND
Fair Skin Complexion - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?

Better Females - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?
Linkle Outfit for Skyrim - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74579/?

One Handed Crossbows - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23164/?
OR
Relics of Hyrule (for Linkle's crossbow) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40615/?
author: littlelee99
